hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas said:"The Messenger of Allah and Zaid bin Thabit had Sahur, then they went and started to pray Subh." We said to Anas: "How long was there between their finishing and their starting to pray?" He said: "As long as it takes a man to recite fifty Verses

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ اخْتِلاَفِ هِشَامٍ وَسَعِيدٍ عَلَى قَتَادَةَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Different Reports from Hisham and Saeed from Qatadah about that
